title: How Republicans Watered Down Their Abortion Message
description: Democrats have gone all-in on abortion rights in these elections. But as the issue started having an impact, Republicans adapted.
dc:creator: Blake Hounshell
media:credit: Hilary Swift for The New York Times
media:description: Dr. Mehmet Oz opposes a federal abortion ban but implied that “local officials” should be involved in the decision of whether to terminate a pregnancy.
